articles.description: From Rumbleverse to Spellbreak, the popular battle royale genre is littered with corpses
articles.content: Its almost poetic that, in a genre built on many people fighting to stay alive until just a few remain, so many battle royale games have launched, flopped, and died over the last few years. Not every… [+1224 chars]
